description.h2: A submission must contain exactly one EX-100.INS or EX-101.INS.
description.p: An XBRL instance submitted in the Voluntary Filing Program may be an EX-100.INS. An Interactive Data instance in XBRL format must be an EX-101.INS.
REMARK: This cannot be tested independently of the EDGAR submission system.

variation.name: 6.3.8, XFD file uses two EX-100.INS, NOGOOD.
variation.description: 6.3.8, XFD file uses two EX-101.INS, NOGOOD.
